DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine prevalence positive antiphospholipid antibody among woman preeclampsia determine effect antiphospholipid antibody severity preeclampsia obstetric outcome
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence Antiphospholipid Antibodies Among Women With Preeclampsia
DOC.detailed_description: For woman include study , blood sample test anticardiolipin antibody lupus anticoagulant . The clinical detail woman collect review hospital prenatal record . The following clinical characteristic evaluate : maternal age , previous gestation , parity , past family history preeclampsia , gestational age onset preeclampsia , gestational age delivery birth weight . The following pregnancy delivery complication assess : placental insufficiency , intrauterine growth restriction , fetal loss ( stillbirth ) early neonatal death .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman preeclampsia . Women systemic autoimmune disease . Women active thromboembolic disorder . Women history previous thromboembolic disorder .
